title: Long Swift Sword Of Siegfried, The, The Lustful Barbarian English 1971

sources.title: Long Swift Sword Of Siegfried, The, The Lustful Barbarian English 1971
sources.description: Don't know as this one needs much of an explanation. Erotic retelling of the Siegfried, Sigurd, Siguror or Sivrit fable depending on your era or language.  Sadly, there are no dragons for our hero to slay, you will just have to settle for Sybil Danning.  This is a dubbed version with some help from director David F Friedman. Probably the main thing he changed was the dialog, the opening monologue is very hip.  Included at the end of the movie are several coming attractions.  Dubbed English
